prompt: Rewrite this prompt to be more specific, layered, and reusable: "{insert prompt}"
Enhance this prompt by adding strategic modifiers like "rank", "simulate", or "rewrite as": "{insert prompt}"
Rewrite this response in 3 distinct tones: professional, casual, and persuasive
Compress this prompt while keeping context and clarity: "{insert long prompt}"
What’s confusing or unclear about this prompt? Suggest fixes
Break this long prompt into logical bullet points with clear steps
Turn this idea into a one-liner power prompt for reuse
Show 3 versions of this prompt: exploratory, instructional, evaluative
Why might this prompt underperform? Diagnose and improve it
Simulate how a pro prompt engineer would rewrite this
Shorten this ChatGPT response to 3 crisp bullet points
Rewrite this response to be clearer and more direct
Map this response tone across 5 options: formal, witty, blunt, helpful, poetic
Insert relevant examples into this answer to improve clarity
Format this answer as a table with columns for pros, cons, and next steps
Analyze this output for hidden assumptions or bias
Add a second layer of insight or context to this response
Rewrite this as: 1) summary, 2) analogy, 3) checklist
Rewrite this response from the POV of a recruiter, designer, and analyst
Flip this answer: what’s the opposite POV or downside?
Explain this to me step by step like I'm new to it. Pause after each step so I can confirm before moving on.
Test my comprehension of this concept with 3 increasing difficulty questions
Summarize this content, then generate a quiz with 5 key questions
Turn this text into Anki-style flashcards with Q&A pairs
Explain this concept in 3 levels: beginner, intermediate, expert
Give me a 10-minute drill to practice this concept with feedback loops
Explain this concept using a vivid metaphor
Give me 3 scenario-based questions to apply this topic
Give the answer, I’ll guess the question — then grade my guess
Turn this idea into a visual explanation or diagram
Show a mini case study of this concept in action with takeaways
Suggest ChatGPT workflows to fit into a 1-hour deep work block
Use ChatGPT to prep me for the day across focus, goals, and context
How can I use ChatGPT to triage and respond to email or messages?
Use ChatGPT to prep for a meeting: questions, objections, angles
How to debrief a project or sprint with ChatGPT’s help
Help me process this article: summarize, extract insights, question
Turn today’s events, notes, or actions into a daily recap with reflection
I got this error message — explain it like I’m 12
Based on my role, suggest 10 high-leverage ChatGPT use cases
Guide me through this decision step-by-step: pros, risks, data
Mirror the tone, rhythm, and phrasing of this writing sample
Rewrite this in blog post, email, tweet, and outline formats
Adjust this writing to be 20% more energetic without being salesy
Rewrite this in the voice of a calm scientist, intense coach, or witty friend
Fix the pacing, sentence structure, and transitions in this writing
Compare this paragraph to my usual writing — what’s off?
Inject more of my personality (funny, thoughtful, sharp) into this draft
Rewrite using a constraint: only metaphors, 3-sentence max, rhyme
Rewrite this in the voice of {famous thinker or creator}
Polish this draft to sound smarter, tighter, more strategic
Break down this decision with options, risks, and key factors
What are 5 sharp questions I’m not asking about this situation?
Brainstorm 10 creative options to approach this problem
Compare 3 possible paths with pros, cons, and hidden traps
Reframe this obstacle into an opportunity — give 3 angles
What’s the likely root cause of this recurring problem?
Test this plan against 3 worst-case scenarios — suggest pivots
What blind spots or assumptions might I be missing here?
Help me build a weighted criteria matrix for this decision
Create a project post-mortem with what worked, failed, and why
Design an ideal weekly schedule for a full-time university student balancing classes, study time, social activities, and self-care.
List your current classes and ask which should be prioritized for maximum GPA impact and future relevance.
Walk me through setting up a Pomodoro workflow for tackling a university reading-heavy course.
Help me identify and reduce my top 3 digital distractions during study blocks.
Build a visual timeline of all my assignment deadlines over the next 6 weeks with recommended start dates.
Analyze my past week hour-by-hour to highlight time leaks and suggest swaps for higher-value tasks.
Create a batching schedule for administrative tasks, readings, and group project meetings.
Simulate how I should restructure my week if one major deadline gets moved up 4 days.
Design a deep work sprint system for finals week with check-ins, rewards, and reset triggers.
Match daily study sessions to my high-energy time windows across the week.
Run a weekly sprint review on academic progress, blockers, and next week’s key goals.
Build a task triage matrix using Eisenhower's method adapted to student tasks.
Create a Sunday night sync checklist for university students to reset for the week ahead.
Simulate a weekly time budget using fixed hours, ideal GPA goals, and campus commitments.
Create a system for identifying and knocking out low-priority academic backlog efficiently.
Help me map academic interests to 5 possible career paths.
Ask me questions that will help narrow down which major fits my long-term goals.
Compare my resume with 3 dream job postings to identify missing skills.
Start with a dream job title and work backward to suggest the ideal steps and timelines.
List the top 7 questions to ask at a university career fair depending on my major.
Review this LinkedIn profile and suggest changes based on recruiter appeal.
Compare two potential career paths based on salary, growth, and daily tasks.
Write a cold email template to request a virtual coffee chat with an alum in my field.
Design a 4-week immersion plan to explore if [career field] is right for me.
Create a checklist to build an online portfolio for my target industry.
Simulate my week 5 years from now in 3 different career paths I’m considering.
Rewrite my resume line-by-line using the STAR method and industry keywords.
Design a radar-style system for tracking internships and entry-level openings.
Build a flashcard system using active recall for a science-heavy course.
Help me convert class notes into a more compressed and visual format.
Turn this lecture transcript into a 10-question quiz with increasing difficulty.
Create a framework to teach this topic to a classmate as a way to test my mastery.
Guide me in building a memory palace for this exam topic.
Compress this 5-page reading into a one-page cheat sheet.
Turn this exam topic into a flowchart showing how concepts connect.
Design a 2-week interleaved study schedule using multiple related topics.
Build a spaced repetition system using forgetting curves.
Help me structure study blocks where output (quizzes, problems) comes before input.
Create a system for weekly peer-to-peer study reviews and shared quiz creation.
Simulate how I’d analyze a failed exam to identify strategy errors and gaps.
Design a competitive study sprint format I can do with friends.
Build a review system that adjusts based on performance and confidence rating.
Turn this topic into auditory, visual, and kinesthetic formats for better encoding.
Give me 10 openers to start casual conversations with classmates.
Help me choose 3 campus clubs to try based on my goals and interests.
Write a starter post to kick off a class-based group chat.
Design a weekly roommate check-in to reduce conflict and improve communication.
Map out 5 ways to meet new people outside my major.
Create a decision filter for which campus events I should attend and why.
Generate 5 messages I can send to casually invite someone to study or hang out.
Design a radar system for identifying and deepening high-potential friendships.
Build a weekly plan that balances social time with recharging needs.
Run through a roommate or group project conflict and simulate 3 resolution styles.
Map out my current weak and strong ties, then suggest 5 actions to expand the network.
Help me evaluate how included I feel on campus and suggest concrete next steps.
Write scripts for following up after an intro at a networking or social event.
List 10 low-effort social options for when I’m drained but want connection.
Design a system for finding or starting social groups based on shared values.
Generate a structured outline for a university-level essay on [topic], including introduction, thesis statement, main arguments, and conclusion.
Create a compelling thesis statement for an essay on [topic], ensuring clarity and arguable stance.
Provide a guide on how to format citations and references in [APA/MLA/Chicago] style for academic papers.
Paraphrase the following paragraph to maintain original meaning while changing sentence structure and vocabulary: [insert paragraph].
Rewrite the following informal text into a formal academic tone suitable for a university assignment: [insert text].
Enhance the following argument by adding evidence, examples, and addressing potential counterarguments: [insert argument].
Create a checklist for peer reviewing academic essays, focusing on structure, clarity, argument strength, and grammar.
Analyze the following text for potential plagiarism issues and suggest ways to rephrase or cite properly: [insert text].
Summarize and synthesize the main findings from the following list of academic sources on [topic]: [insert sources].
Draft a concise and informative abstract for a research paper on [topic], highlighting objectives, methods, results, and conclusions.
Write a detailed methodology section for a research project on [topic], including research design, data collection, and analysis methods.
Develop a framework for critically analyzing academic texts, focusing on argument validity, evidence quality, and bias detection.
Create a step-by-step plan for editing and proofreading an academic essay, covering content, structure, style, and grammar checks.
Identify potential research gaps in the field of [topic] based on the following literature: [insert literature].
Assess the following academic paper for readiness for publication, providing feedback on originality, clarity, and contribution to the field: [insert paper].
Develop a personalized study schedule for upcoming exams in [subjects], balancing study time, breaks, and revision.
Generate a set of practice questions for [subject/topic] to test understanding and application of key concepts.
Create a concept map linking major topics and subtopics in [subject], illustrating relationships and hierarchies.
Design a self-assessment quiz for [subject/topic] to evaluate current knowledge and identify areas for improvement.
Suggest effective memory techniques (e.g., mnemonics, visualization) for retaining information in [subject].
Provide strategies for approaching different types of exam questions (e.g., multiple-choice, essays) in [subject].
Develop a plan to manage exam-related stress, including relaxation techniques, time management, and healthy habits.
Simulate a mock exam for [subject], including timed sections and a variety of question types.
Analyze common mistakes made in [subject] exams and provide tips to avoid them.
Create a system to track exam preparation progress, including goals, completed tasks, and performance metrics.
Plan an effective group study session for [subject], including agenda, roles, and collaborative activities.
Review past exam papers in [subject] to identify recurring themes and question patterns.
Design exercises to improve time management skills during exams, focusing on pacing and prioritization.
Assemble a toolkit of resources and affirmations to boost confidence before and during exams.
Develop an adaptive learning plan that adjusts study focus based on ongoing performance assessments in [subject].
Create a template for reflecting on exam performance, identifying strengths, weaknesses, and areas for growth.
Simulate 3 customer personas based on this product description and rank them by likelihood to convert. Add details: goals, objections, buying signals.
Analyze these customer reviews and extract the dominant voice, tone, and recurring pain points.
Based on this draft survey, suggest improvements to increase clarity and emotional resonance.
From this product idea, infer 5 customer pain points and suggest how to validate each.
List 3 audience segments most affected by this trend and how their behaviors differ.
From this subreddit thread, extract the 5 most upvoted emotional triggers and map to product benefits.
Given this 2023 persona, update it for 2025 with predicted behaviors, tools, and priorities.
Take this audience and split into 4 micro-segments with unique messaging hooks.
Create 10 objections this niche audience might have and match them with counter-messaging.
Compare Gen Z and Millennial responses to this ad concept using likely psychographics.
Rewrite this paragraph in 5 brand voices: luxury, playful, urgent, minimalist, educational.
Give me 10 scroll-stopping hooks for this product targeting Instagram reels.
Design a weekly content stack (1 longform, 3 mid, 7 short) for this audience and goal.
Describe a visual storyboard for this ad concept that maximizes emotional contrast.

Compare this product against top 3 competitors and highlight missing features.

Suggest ways to implement predictive analytics in marketing strategies.

Craft a compelling value proposition for this service.
Create a brand voice guide outlining tone, language, and style.
Conduct a competitive analysis to identify brand differentiation opportunities.
Design a brand architecture that includes sub-brands and product lines.

Suggest methods to measure brand equity over time.
Design a survey to assess customer perception of the brand.
Develop a brand story that resonates with the target audience.
Audit the current visual identity and recommend updates to align with brand strategy.
Audit this code for style consistency, naming conventions, and comment clarity. Return suggestions organized by file and priority.
Review this code for security vulnerabilities, edge cases, and common exploits. Output risks, affected lines, and suggested fixes.
Scan this repo for anti-patterns, overengineering, or unnecessary complexity. Rank red flags by severity.
Identify and list any dead code, unused imports, or redundant logic in this project. Suggest removals with justification.
Analyze this function for cyclomatic complexity. Recommend simplifications if over 10.
Rewrite comments in this codebase to better explain intent, not just logic.
Run a best practice audit on this module — highlight deviations and suggest better idioms.
Step through this code and narrate what it’s doing line-by-line until the bug appears.
At this failure point, what are all state variables and their values? Simulate the exact stack trace and memory state.
Diagnose and suggest a fix for this error log. Return three potential causes with ranked likelihoods.
Refactor this messy block before debugging. Clean up logic, separate concerns, and reindent for clarity.
Write a unit test to isolate this bug. Keep inputs minimal and make failure visible.
Map the full call chain leading to this crash. Visualize in text and highlight critical dependencies.
Generate 5 debugging scenarios that could trigger this same bug. Vary user inputs and edge cases.
Insert strategic log statements to pinpoint where the bug is emerging. Return updated code with logs.
Collapse this sequence into a single reusable, named function. Improve readability and reduce repetition.
Find all repeated logic and abstract into shared utilities or constants. Return proposed diffs.
Extract this class into its own module. Show before/after import/export changes.
Rename variables and functions here for better intent and consistency. Avoid cryptic abbreviations.
Lift all error handling into a centralized strategy. Use custom exceptions where needed.
Restructure this file to clearly separate concerns: data access, business logic, and UI.
Evaluate this recent refactor. Was it an improvement? Where could it still be improved?
Suggest a design pattern (e.g., Factory, Strategy, Observer) for this structure. Justify the fit.
Restructure this project’s folder layout to better reflect domain logic and responsibilities.
Define clear boundaries for services, components, and data layers in this system. Use bullet points.
How would you decouple this tightly-bound logic into swappable modules or services?
Map all services, their responsibilities, and interactions. Return as a hierarchy or flowchart text.
List all external dependencies. Flag unnecessary, outdated, or risky ones.
Rewrite this monolithic logic as a microservice — include endpoint list, data model, and key concerns.
Identify logic in this file that is not covered by any existing tests. List uncovered blocks by function.
Generate a test skeleton for this module with stubbed unit and integration test cases.
Generate a fuzz test for this function to catch unusual edge cases and input types.
Write a mocking strategy for external dependencies in these tests. Include sample mocks.
Review this test suite for redundancy, missing edge cases, or over-specification.
Write a stress test to simulate high load or concurrency conditions for this function.
Analyze recent test runs to identify and explain likely sources of flaky tests.
Recommend a modern tool stack (linters, formatters, debuggers, profilers) for this language ecosystem.
Generate a Git pre-commit hook config to lint, format, and run tests before pushing.
Run a simulated performance profiling on this code block. Suggest optimizations if >100ms.
Fix this broken CI pipeline. Show updated YAML and explain each fix.
Wrap this script into a CLI tool using your language’s standard library. Include argument parsing.
Generate editorconfig and VSCode settings to enforce consistent dev standards.
Produce a table of code metrics: lines per function, file size, comment ratio, test coverage %.
Rewrite this dense logic into a format suitable for explaining to a junior dev.
Act as a pair programmer — narrate thoughts while reviewing this pull request.
Create an async dev handoff doc summarizing this task, WIP state, blockers, and next steps.
Rewrite this git commit history to be more readable and informative. Use active voice.
Simulate a pull request review for this code. Leave comments like a senior engineer would.
Plan a safe merge of this large branch. Include checklist and fallback steps.
Generate a code review checklist tailored to this project’s tech stack and practices.
Analyze this loop for unnecessary operations or performance issues. Suggest rewrites to reduce time complexity.
Reduce the number of database calls made by this function. Suggest caching or batching strategies.
Profile this code’s memory usage. Identify any leaks, large allocations, or repeated object creation.
Estimate the time and space complexity of this algorithm. Justify each part with reasoning.
Find and optimize the hot path in this logic. Show before/after performance benchmarks.
Which parts of this function can be safely parallelized or async’d? Add a threading/async strategy.
Rewrite this code to use lazy evaluation or generators. Return revised version with explanations.
Convert this row-by-row logic into a batch-processing pipeline. Use streaming or vectorized ops where applicable.
Ensure all resources (files, sockets, DB connections) are properly closed. Add guards or contexts.
Compare performance before and after this change. Return benchmark diff and tradeoffs.
Describe your ideal customer profile. Then, simulate a customer avatar and create three marketing messages tailored to them.
List your top 3 competitors. Now, generate a unique positioning statement that clearly differentiates your business.
Outline your current marketing funnel. Ask the AI to identify friction points and suggest optimizations.

Build a basic 3-year financial projection using given revenue and cost inputs. Include P&L, cash flow, and balance sheet.
Create a model that toggles between best, base, and worst-case financial scenarios. Return the logic and assumptions.
Audit this financial model for hardcoded values, broken references, and unrealistic assumptions.
Add a sensitivity table to this model showing how profit changes with 5% swings in input variables.
Extract and list 10 key financial KPIs from this model. Include formula references and business context.
Map all the key revenue and cost drivers in this model. Show how they roll up into projections.
Add a Monte Carlo simulation layer to this financial model. Explain the setup and show sample results.
Build a discounted cash flow valuation for this business. Return terminal value, NPV, and assumptions.
Find and list public company comparables for this firm. Show valuation multiples (P/E, EV/EBITDA, etc.).
Highlight and explain 5 key investment risks in this opportunity based on the current memo.
Estimate and break down the TAM, SAM, and SOM for this market. Use a bottom-up logic.
Evaluate the competitive moat of this company. Rate strength across network, brand, IP, and cost advantages.
Backsolve the IRR of this investment based on the exit year and return multiple.
Value this company across three strategic scenarios — show implied return and risks for each.
Build an exit waterfall showing proceeds distribution across investors and founders under a $100M exit.
Create a zero-based budget template for a SaaS company with 20 employees. No rollovers allowed.
Analyze this budget vs. actual report. Flag top 5 cost variances and explain likely causes.
Add a rolling forecast layer to this budget that updates monthly based on YTD data.
Based on current burn, how many months of runway remain? Return breakeven and depletion scenarios.
Convert this P&L into a direct method cash flow statement. Include working capital changes.
Reallocate this master budget across 5 departments. Justify allocation based on function size and impact.
